scripts.dev:app: npm --workspace app run dev || echo 'app: no dev script'
scripts.dev:server: npm --workspace server run dev:server || echo 'server: no dev script'
scripts.build:marketing: npm --workspace marketing run build || echo 'marketing: no build needed'
scripts.build:app: npm --workspace app run build || echo 'app: no build script'
scripts.ios: cd app && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf ios/App/App/Assets.xcassets/AppIcon.appiconset ios/App/App/Assets.xcassets/Splash.imageset && npx @capacitor/assets generate --ios && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
